 URL : "https://github.com/iobis/obistools/issues/39" TITLE : check_depth problem BODY : r > aa <- occurrence abra alba retrieved 39657 records of 39657 100% > check_depth aa error in lookup_xy data, shoredistance = true, areas = false : 7b227469746c65223a20224572726f72206c6f6f6b696e67207570206461746120666f722070726f766964656420706f696e7473222c20226465736372697074696f6e223a2022696e6465782039343830206973206f7574206f6620626f756e647320666f722061786973203120776974682073697a652039343830227d
